lead_paragraph: GARDNER--Tina. The leadership, staff, and worldwide community of the Weizmann Institute of Science deeply mourn the passing of our dear friend, Tina Gardner. A passionate supporter of the Weizmann Institute and Texas A&M University, Tina and her husband, Paul, have been the driving forces of an extraordinary research collaboration between the two institutions. Though we have lost an inspiring advocate and a valued President's Circle member, Tina's legacy will live on through this important partnership, which will help improve the quality of life for millions around the world. We extend our heartfelt condolences to her husband, Paul, an American Committee National Board member; to her son, Todd, and daughter-in-law, Stacey; to her grandchildren; and to the entire family. May Tina's memory be for a blessing. Ellen Merlo National Chair, American Committee Dr. Jay A. Levy President, American Committee Marshall S. Levin Chief Executive Officer, American Committee Prof. Daniel Zajfman President, Weizmann Institute of Science Abraham Ben-Naftali Chair, International Board 1/3
